description: Digitized the freight quotation process for CMA CGM by developing a modern web application from scratch using Angular and PrimeNG, significantly improving efficiency and user experience.
achievements: Developed a freight quotation generation system from the ground up using Angular and PrimeNG, reducing quotation processing time by 70% by replacing the legacy manual process for booking freight and ships.
Developed the user interface from scratch using Angular and PrimeNG, resulting in a more efficient and user-friendly experience.
Wrote unit and integration test cases using Jasmine and Karma to ensure high-quality, bug-free releases.
Received Infosys Insta Award for outstanding contribution to the development and successful release of the AQUA MVP.
Provided post-launch support, resolving production issues and ensuring smooth operations during the MVP’s initial adoption phase.
Contributed to incremental feature updates and enhancements post-MVP, improving system performance, usability, and customer satisfaction.

description: Led the modernization of Cisco's flagship security platform, migrating a legacy codebase to a modern tech stack. Implemented advanced state management and testing frameworks, significantly improving application performance and user experience.
responsibilities: Spearheaded the front-end modernization of Cisco's Security Cloud Control (SCC) platform, leading a migration from a legacy AngularJS codebase to Angular 15.
Improvised and implemented a new UI, adhering to Cisco's Magnetic Designs UI library and web design policies.

Implemented a robust state management solution using the Facade Observer pattern with NgRx and RxJS, which transformed the application into a Single-Page Application (SPA) and significantly improved loading speeds and user experience.
Authored and executed comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end tests using Jest and Cypress to ensure code quality and application stability.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to resolve critical user-reported bugs, leading to a successful migration with positive end-user feedback.
Mentored and supported other development teams, providing guidance on integration testing and understanding complex code flows.
